metadata.title: Vanity Fair Women's Body Caress Full Coverage Underwire Bra 75335
features: Full-coverage bra in matte finish featuring contouring cups with underwire and silky trims
Microfiber wings wrap around and smooth back
description: The body caress full coverage underwire bra provides all-day comfort and confidence. This bra is versatile with 2-way convertible straps that allows you to wear it regularly or crisscross. The straps are adjustable for a custom fit. This bra is also ultra-soft against your skin and provides a smooth look under clothes. The body caress full coverage underwire bra features a decorative satin trim outlining the top of the cups and straps.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "1 x 1 x 1 inches; 1 Pounds", "Item model number": "75335", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "December 14, 2002", "Manufacturer": "Vanity Fair Women's Bras"}
